issue.title: [Python] Address docstrings in Filesystems (Implementations)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16092](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16092). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
#### Ensure docstrings for Filesystem Implementations have an `Examples` section:
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.fs.LocalFileSystem.html#pyarrow.fs.LocalFileSystem>
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.fs.S3FileSystem.html#pyarrow.fs.S3FileSystem>
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.fs.HadoopFileSystem.html#pyarrow.fs.HadoopFileSystem>
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.fs.SubTreeFileSystem.html#pyarrow.fs.SubTreeFileSystem>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16092?focusedCommentId=17558236) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
